languages.text: Ересь творчества может приносить практические плоды — если подданным будет дозволено тайно производить изобретенные ими механизмы.
The heresy of creativity may bear practical fruit — if subjects are allowed to secretly produce the mechanisms they invent.
languages.original_text: Ересь творчества может приносить практические плоды — если подданным будет дозволено тайно производить изобретенные ими механизмы.

traits.locale_text: The sin of creativity may bear practical fruit — if the subjects are allowed to secretly produce the mechanisms they invent.
The sin of creativity may bear practical fruit — if the subjects are allowed to secretly produce the mechanisms they invent.
The sin of creativity may bear practical fruit — if subjects are allowed to secretly produce the mechanisms they invent.
The sin of creativity may bear practical fruit — if subjects are allowed to secretly produce the mechanisms they invent.
The heresy of creativity may bear practical fruit — if subjects are allowed to secretly produce the mechanisms they invent.

languages.text: L'hérésie de la créativité peut avoir des effets utiles, si les sujets sont autorisés à produire en secret les mécanismes qu'ils inventent.
languages.original_text: The heresy of creativity may bear practical fruit — if subjects are allowed to secretly produce the mechanisms they invent.

traits.locale_text: L'hérésie de la créativité peut avoir des effets utiles, si les sujets sont autorisés à produire en secret les mécanismes qu'ils inventent.

languages.text: もし臣民が、自分が発明したメカニズムを密かに製造することを許されるなら、創造性の罪は実用的な実を結ぶかもしれない。
languages.original_text: The heresy of creativity may bear practical fruit — if subjects are allowed to secretly produce the mechanisms they invent.

traits.locale_text: もし臣民が、自分が発明したメカニズムを密かに製造することを許されるなら、創造性の罪は実用的な実を結ぶかもしれない。
もし臣民が、自分が発明したメカニズムを密かに製造することを許されるなら、創造性の罪は実用的な実を結ぶかもしれない。

languages.text: 如果允许你的臣民秘密制造他们发明的机器，那么异端的造物也可能结出富有成效的果实。
languages.original_text: The heresy of creativity may bear practical fruit — if subjects are allowed to secretly produce the mechanisms they invent.

traits.locale_text: 如果允许你的臣民秘密制造他们发明的机器，那么异端的造物也可能结出富有成效的果实。

languages.text: La herejía de la creatividad puede dar frutos si se permite a los sujetos producir en secreto los mecanismos que inventan.
languages.original_text: The heresy of creativity may bear practical fruit — if subjects are allowed to secretly produce the mechanisms they invent.

traits.locale_text: La herejía de la creatividad puede dar frutos si se permite a los sujetos producir en secreto los mecanismos que inventan.

languages.text: Die Ketzerei der Kreativität kann praktische Früchte tragen ... wenn Untertanen gestattet wird, die von ihnen erfundenen Mechanismen heimlich zu produzieren.
languages.original_text: The heresy of creativity may bear practical fruit — if subjects are allowed to secretly produce the mechanisms they invent.

traits.locale_text: Die Ketzerei der Kreativität kann praktische Früchte tragen ... wenn Untertanen gestattet wird, die von ihnen erfundenen Mechanismen heimlich zu produzieren.
Die Sünde der Kreativität kann praktische Früchte tragen — wenn es Untertanen gestattet wird, die von ihnen erfundenen Mechanismen heimlich zu produzieren.

languages.text: Tebaaya icat ettikleri mekanizmaları el altından üretme imkânı tanınırsa bu kâfirliğin faydası olabilir.
languages.original_text: The heresy of creativity may bear practical fruit — if subjects are allowed to secretly produce the mechanisms they invent.
